title: fgualdr/nf_chipmm pipeline - params.input schema
description: Schema for the file provided with params.input

rid.errorMessage: RID id specific for individual run and individual sample

sid.errorMessage: SID id specific for the samples across run

sample.errorMessage: Sample name or condition, this will be automatically combined with the replicate by an underscore

replicate.errorMessage: Replicate number in the form of R1,R2,R3,.. or r1,r2,r3

path.errorMessage: Path to the run folder as demultiplexed by the facility

lanes.errorMessage: Given the schema of sample name demultiplexed which is: 'rid...sid...ll..R1..fastq.gz' ll being the lane number of the sequencer. if all is specified any lane will be combined

is_input.errorMessage: Whether the sample is an input or not TRUE/FALSE

which_input.errorMessage: Which input to use for peak calling i.e. sample name as: sample'_'replicate specified for a particular sample. if only sample specific it takes any sample matching until '_R' is any specified it combines all inputs if present
